template.name: Template App Oracle Database
template.description: Template for Oracle database monitoring end-point It used for monitoring from Management host with installed Zabbix agent Instance name has to be updated in MACROS section

item.name: Database role
item.description: Database role: PRIMARY PHYSICAL STANDBY LOGICAL STANDBY etc

item.name: Database size
item.description: -1 returned in case when database is in standby mode, size cannot be determined

item.name: FRA used space (bytes)
item.description: Currently utilized space in FRA in bytes

item.name: Names and number of instances (json)
item.description: Information about instances in JSON format: current total number string of instances names, semicolon separated

item.name: Instances data (json)
item.description: Information about instances in JSON format: startup time host name

item.name: Date of the last successful database backup
Hours since the last successful database backup
Date of the last successful log backup
Hours since the last successful log backup
Maximum amount of processes for this database
Processes (json)
item.description: Information about database's processes in JSON format: maximum possible amount current amount percentage of utilization

trigger_prototype.name: ASM diskgroup {#ASM_DISKGROUP_NAME} is in an invalid state
Guarantee restore point {#RESTORE_POINT_NAME} has been created on {ITEM.VALUE}
Hostname for the instance {#INSTANCE_NAME} has been changed
The instance {#INSTANCE_NAME} has been restarted at {ITEM.VALUE}
PDB {#PDB_NAME} is in an invalid state ({ITEM.VALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: PDB is not in READ/WRITE mode

discovery_rule.name: PDBs tablespaces
discovery_rule.description: List all tablespaces for all tablespaces

item_prototype.name: Backup mode duration of {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace, PDB {#PDB_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Tablespace "{#TABLESPACE_NAME}" (PDB {#PDB_NAME}) is in an invalid state {ITEM.VALUE}
Tablespace "{#TABLESPACE_NAME}" in PDB {#PDB_NAME} is in backup mode for more then {$BACKUP_MODE_WARNING} hours ({ITEM.VALUE})
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace, PDB {#PDB_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace, PDB {#PDB_NAME}

dependency.name: Used more than {$TBS_HIGH} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace, PDB {#PDB_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Status of the standby database {#STANDBY_DEST} is invalid ({ITEM.VALUE})
Tablespace {#TABLESPACE_NAME} is in an invalid state {ITEM.VALUE}
Tablespace {#TABLESPACE_NAME} is in backup mode for more than {$BACKUP_MODE_WARNING} hours
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace

dependency.name: Used more than {$TBS_HIGH} % of available space for {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace

trigger.name: Corrupted blocks have been detected
trigger.description: Corrupted blocks have been detected, normally as part of backup by RMAN

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_USAGE_HIGH} %
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded HIGH threshold

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_USAGE_WARNING} %
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded WARNING threshold

trigger.name: No database backups for more than {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_DB_BACKUP} hours
No logs backups for more than {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_LOG_BACKUP} hours
Role of the instance has been changed (Current role: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Change of instance's role has been detected

trigger.name: The instance is not available (Reason: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The instance is not available Instance can be in Primary or Standby role, the following states are considered as ONLINE: OPEN - Primary Role OPEN:STANDBY - Active DataGuard (or ReadOnly) MOUNT:STANDBY - Standby database

trigger.name: The number of instances in the cluster ({ITEM.VALUE}) is less than it was in past
trigger.description: The number of instances is less than it was previous check

trigger.name: The number of processes exceeded the threshold {$PROCESSES_HIGH} %
trigger.description: Utilization of current processes exceeded threshold percentage
